data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 4
data.actual_result: It only shows the time of that day.
data.expected_result: It should show both, date and time.
data.short_description: "X new messages since" bar only shows the time but not the date
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you have unread messages from the past days - If necessary, click on the new message bar to scroll to the oldest newest message - Observe the date of the new message bar
